meanings.sent1: That dipshits over there keeps forgetting his keys.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the dipshits for not paying attention in class.
meanings.sent3: The dipshits at the party thought a tomato was a fruit!
meanings.sent4: Don't be a dipshits and try to fix the car without any tools.
meanings.sent5: The dipshits in the horror movie always made the wrong decisions.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are incompetent or clueless.
meanings.sent1: The dipshits in the office couldn't even operate the printer.
meanings.sent2: We ended up lost because the dipshits leading the way had no sense of direction.
meanings.sent3: The dipshits in the team meeting kept arguing over the wrong topic.
meanings.sent4: The dipshits on the project team were like chickens running around with their heads cut off.
meanings.sent5: The dipshits in the comedy show always brought laughter with their silly antics.
